title: Magnus Walker
description:
Magnus Walker is one of the biggest personalities in the automotive space. He’s been in countless videos, partnered with companies like Hot Wheels and Nike, collected many fast and interesting automobiles. Now, he’s the host of “Next Big Thing” on Hagerty, a show all about finding the unloved cars that people passed up but probably shouldn’t have.

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping.

 

When you purchase a 3-month Babbel subscription, you’ll get an additional 3 months for free. Just go to Babbel.com and use promo code TIRE.

 

Right now, the first 100 listeners who go to Sennheiser.com/Podcast and use promo code TIRE will receive 15% off the Momentum True Wireless 2 earbuds or any of their amazing headphones.

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
